statements: DELETE FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 200 AND date_issued < '2022-01-01' AND payment_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 500 AND total_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM invoices WHERE invoice_id = 100 AND customer_id = 500;
DELETE FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 200 AND invoice_id = 100;
DELETE FROM Invoices WHERE invoice_id = 1001 AND amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount <= 500.00 AND payment_date < '2021-08-01';
